previewArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Vancouver Whitecaps FC continue their BC Place homestand when Chivas USA visit British Columbia on Saturday evening.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs Chivas USA | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.desc: Carlyle Mitchell (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Carlyle Mitchell trips up Avila

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: BC Place is bathed in glorious sunshine as referee Armando Villarreal starts this encounter. #VWFC vs #CDCU. #vancouver - #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Carlyle Mitchell (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the center of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Sebastian Fernandez sends a headed attempt wide of goal

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 10': Morales directs it nicely to Mtchell, but #VWFC defender just misses with the header

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a cross.
Offside, Chivas USA. Eric Avila tries a through ball, but Marvin Chávez is caught offside.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 12': Kekuta Manneh with a wicked run down the left flank, but his cross is defended well by #ChivasUSA.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Erick Torres.
Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Kekuta Manneh just ran right by one defender to the end line, cut by another, and sent a low cross into the box on goal. Brilliant. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Steven Beitashour with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Bishnu
timelineItems.text: It's strange to see someone do it from the right back position but Beitashour totally stabilizes the D. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 15' - Looking to be a good Western Conference battle tonight at @bcplace. Both sides seemed willing to get forward and attack! #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Kekuta Manneh tries a through ball, but Erik Hurtado is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: OFFSIDE: Erik Hurtado finishes but is ruled offside

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Kekuta Manneh tries a through ball, but Erik Hurtado is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Erik Hurtado.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: And we're underway at BC Place! Vamos #ChivasUSA! #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Flags up. Here we go. #VANvCHV http://t.co/m4vKGhLLV2

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Flags up. Here we go. #VANvCHV http://t.co/m4vKGhLLV2

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: not even a minute gone and Mitchell picks up a yellow card - bit of a wild streak in him like #TFC's Doneil Henry #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: still a very nice volley from Hurtado even if he was offside! #VWFC #ChivasUSA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Mauro Rosales tries a through ball, but Marvin Chávez is caught offside.
Match ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 3.

timelineItems.name: Mike Martignago
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC David Ousted's never run that much in his life.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Barrera seals it for #ChivasUSA, which takes a 3-1 lead over Vancouver in the final minute

timelineItems.name: James Bufton
timelineItems.text: Disappointing, man. Bounce back asap vs Toronto a must. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: GOAL - Leandro Barrera scores to make it 3-1 as David Ousted had gone up the pitch to try and help tie the match. #ChivasUSA Wins. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Garret
timelineItems.text: So much for that fortress....@WhitecapsFC @bcplace #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Chobaniuk
timelineItems.text: Damn damn, he had control, right call, 'Caps come up short, bonehead red card play was huge... #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: #vwfc fans I feel your pain but you're not allowed to kick the ball out of the keepers hands

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: This one is over. #WhitecapsFC unravel in second half. Lose 3-1. Could've easily had a bigger lead at the half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: My children just chided me for being too loud. Sorry neighbors, but that was worth it!!!!! #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Lisa Richardson
timelineItems.text: That was silly! #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: The Rambler
timelineItems.text: #VWFC again showing no depth. But Boss Bob keeps his job. Pathetic

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: That's the game folks! #VWFC suffer unfortunate 3-1 loss to @cdchivasusa tonight at @bcplace. #OntoTheNext

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC remain in 5th in the West as they lose only their second game at home all season... both playing with 10 men #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Carl Robinson just finished a chat with referee Armando Villarreal near midfield. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Cody Sharrett
timelineItems.text: Nothing like the 45-yard roller. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Leandro Barrera puts the icing on the cake for @CDChivasUSA in stoppage time. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Huge road victory for #ChivasUSA and fourth consecutive win overall. Cubo @erickestefano15 Cubo has scored in five consecutive games

timelineItems.name: Over There
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA have now won four league games in a row for the first time since 2008. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: VanCityVilla
timelineItems.text: This season can turn south very quick for the Caps with Toronto coming up on Wednesday and RSL Saturday. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Meghan Kavanaugh
timelineItems.text: Happy for Wilmer. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @CDChivasUSA are 3-1 winners over @WhitecapsFC on the road. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Final 3-1. #ChivasUSA win 4 straight for first time in 6 years. However @1DanKennedy's shutout streak is broken. New one begins next week.

timelineItems.name: Vancity_FC
timelineItems.text: That’s gotta be Reo Coker’s last chance, surely? @WhitecapsFC #broadsideodbarn #Vwfc

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Bollwitt
timelineItems.text: Odd experience today. No Marie, no @southsiders capo, red card, missed goals, crowd tossing bottles on pitch, loss to Chivas... #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Woosang Lee
timelineItems.text: Stay classy #VWFC fans...� http://t.co/VIzdh2MJct

timelineItems.name: Woosang Lee
timelineItems.text: Stay classy #VWFC fans...� http://t.co/VIzdh2MJct

timelineItems.desc: Vancouver Whitecaps FC continue their BC Place homestand when Chivas USA visit British Columbia on Saturday evening.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs Chivas USA | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Erick Torres tries a through ball, but Tony Lochhead is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: Bocanegra has been so solid thus far, commanding the back line making smart positional runs. Huge in the last 3 wins for Chivas. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: That was some next level Costa Rican defending right there from the Chivas back four. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Certainly the opportunities are there for #WhitecapsFC early on. Been guilty a few times tonight of trying to make extra move in the box.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: It says 4-2-3-1 but I read it more as a 4-3-3 especially with the speed that Chavez burning all over the right wing. #chivas #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Less than half an hour to kick off | A menos de media hora para el arranque del partido #VANvCHV http://t.co/oHlPP6HRlI

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Less than half an hour to kick off | A menos de media hora para el arranque del partido #VANvCHV http://t.co/oHlPP6HRlI

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: #VWFC's attack impresses me almost every time I watch. No goals yet tonight, but they're coming.

timelineItems.name: westcoastgirl
timelineItems.text: Pitch side #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Phil Figueiredo
timelineItems.text: Home sweet home. #VWFC @whitecapsfc @duter @caitydawn

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @erickestefano15 has scored three goals against Vancouver in #MLS, he has only scored as many against New York. Familiar. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.text: Let's go @WhitecapsFC #VWFC http://t.co/RTHgijH9aQ

timelineItems.text: Let's go @WhitecapsFC #VWFC http://t.co/RTHgijH9aQ

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: #VWFC are looking for back-to-back MLS wins for the second time this season – they took down San Jose (5/03) and Columbus (5/10)

timelineItems.name: Amelia
timelineItems.text: Man. I am sweating in my @whitecaps jersey just sitting here at @bcplace Can't imagine having to play in this heat. Real professionals #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Amartian

timelineItems.text: Plenty of time left. We got this!! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.text: Also, that was @cdchivasusa's first goal conceded in four #MLS matches. Last concession: June 8 Super Clasico vs @LAGalaxy. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #VWFC look comfortable bossing #ChivasUSA - just a matter of time before 2nd goal added, Goats not threatening much on counter #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.text: At the #WhitecapsFC game with the Bae ❤️ http://t.co/YJ9L8iJ2eh

timelineItems.name: ♛Monivoi Vataiki♛
timelineItems.text: At the #WhitecapsFC game with the Bae ❤️ http://t.co/YJ9L8iJ2eh

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Goats right back Donny Toia the latest #MLS defender to be given headaches dealing with an attack-minded @kekuta16 coming at him. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Farhan Devji
timelineItems.text: Man, how solid is Beitashour? The more I see him, the more I appreciate him. Quietly very, very effective. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gershon Koffie.
Attempt missed. Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Marvin Chávez.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 41' Fernadez shot from outside of the box goes wide | Fernández dispara a gol desde arriba del área grande pero su disparo de va por fuera

timelineItems.name: Mark Rogers
timelineItems.text: At what temperature is it too hot for Carl not to wear a sweater? #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Dr Fever (|||+)
timelineItems.text: Nothing is more selfish than ruining a good build up by trying a 30 yard strike #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: @WhitecapsFC have settled into the match since taking the lead. @cdchivasusa doing a bit of chasing, as we reach halftime. #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Kelly Mckay
timelineItems.text: There has been no real threat to Ousteds' goal in the first half, has been all #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: James Bufton
timelineItems.text: No qualms with 1st half, hope this tempo is maintained for the second, but last week's game proves that #vwfc can shut up shop if necessary.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: End of 1st half. #WhitecapsFC with 1-0 lead on Carlyle Mitchell's first career MLS goal. Said this a lot, but could be up a few more. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: And that's half-time! Pedro Morales with his team-high 7th assist this season on Carlyle Mitchell's first-ever goal, as #VWFC leads 1-0!

timelineItems.name: Jayson Kirby
timelineItems.text: Good first half! #WhitecapsFC ate attacking well and controlling the play. Need to keep the pace in the second half.

timelineItems.name: Jake Nemec
timelineItems.text: Kekuta needs to step up to keep his starting spot. Other than that, solid 45 from #VWFC.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #chivas defense are getting beat by through balls, they aren't staying in front of #whitecaps nor are they catching them offsides #vanvchv

timelineItems.name: Peter Rogan
timelineItems.text: What a sweet corner from Morales. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Chobaniuk
timelineItems.text: Carlyle Mitchell redeems himself from the early yellow and pots the lone goal, 'Caps up 1-0 going into the half. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jayson Kirby
timelineItems.text: Great evening for a football match! Pretty stinkin’ hot though ;) #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Hall
timelineItems.text: Tonight's game reinforces why we need an experienced clinical striker. Should be 3-0. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: James Papadopoulos
timelineItems.text: #whitecapsfc playing well this half. Manneh playing well. Excited about #worldcuppup final tmrw!

timelineItems.name: Kasey Shadow
timelineItems.text: So is Leveron + Mitchell > Demerit + AOB? #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Shoe Thief
timelineItems.text: @squadplayer & enough of Hurtado. Bring on Matocks! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Hall
timelineItems.text: Would be nice to be bringing on Manneh as your second half striker. #notawinger #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Marc Trasolini
timelineItems.text: Let's go!! #WhitecapsFC http://t.co/A084kKWHdH

timelineItems.name: Marc Trasolini
timelineItems.text: Let's go!! #WhitecapsFC http://t.co/A084kKWHdH

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 0.

timelineItems.name: VCTF
timelineItems.text: Been so impressed with Beitashour this season. Great defensively, and still adds an attacking presence. Huge! #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 1. Agustin Pelletieri (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mauro Rosales from a corner kick.

timelineItems.name: VCTF
timelineItems.text: Another goal from a corner. This one going the wrong way. 1-1 #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA ties it up, 47th minute, off a corner. 1-1. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Chivas levels with a corner of their own. #VWFC with some Brazil like defending on that corner.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Pelletieri's goal almost a carbon copy of Mitchell's opener 1-1 #VWFC #ChivasUSA #MLS

timelineItems.text: GOAL - Agustin Pelletieri converts the Mauro Rosales corner and #ChivasUSA have tied the match 1-1 in the 47' vs #WhitecapsFC. @MLS

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 47' GOAL!!! Chivas tie it up by also scoring off of a corner. 1-1 just 2 minutes into the 2nd half #VANvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Sebastian Fernandez clips Minda

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Argentine's equalizer has given the visitors new life. #VWFC look a bit stunned to be level to start the 2nd half. #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 54: Referee Villarreal notes Fernandez's name in the book and brandishes the yellow card at the #VWFC player. #vancouver 1 - 1 #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: don't see much of #ChivasUSA, but their defending impresses me - very stiff down middle, crowding out midfield #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Tom Biro
timelineItems.text: I’m pretty close to not feeling bad for @1DanKennedy anymore. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Pedro Morales sails his free kick over the goal

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: @Agus8P bags his first MLS goal with a free header inside the six. #VANvCHV Watch --> http://t.co/sGtwXzPxNH

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #chivas crosses grew from 0 to 6 in the ten minutes since halftime as Rosales has swung from central to right #vanvchv

timelineItems.comment: Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Donny Toia (Chivas USA).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 4': #VWFC were down to ten men for a couple minutes as Pedro Morales was down --- tying his shoes. He's okay, now.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Wembley Bound
timelineItems.text: #vwfc #tsn #mls Whitecaps missing a clinical finisher and an attacking midfielder

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Delgado (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Erick Torres can not quite direct his header on frame

timelineItems.name: J. Cavazos
timelineItems.text: Kekutah has some crazy speed, sooner or later the game will catch up to him. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Marco Delgado.

timelineItems.name: Brandon Kostinuk
timelineItems.text: Tiebert in for Morales...Beitashour needs to get a touch on that. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Michael Ng
timelineItems.text: Mannah too many turnovers..need to ease off the footwork and attempt to get his teammates mode involved #whitecapsfc

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: CUBO! so close. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 'Cubo' inadvertently plays defender and saves #VWFC's blushes, deflecting a big Chivas chance over the home side's bar. #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Jordan Harvey tries a through ball, but Erik Hurtado is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: D
timelineItems.text: The Whitecaps' forwards are frustrating. No patience, just wild shots in hopes of landing one. Kenny Miller is missed. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Cruz
timelineItems.text: Double sub coming on for #WhitecapsFC Mattocks and Reo-Coker getting ready.

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Possession leans even heavier in #vwfc favor but #chivas backline is maintaining shape and keeping the ball out of zone 14. #vanvchv

timelineItems.desc: Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the red card.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Jordan Harvey two foots Oswaldo MInda

timelineItems.comment: Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC double substitution. IN Darren Mattocks, Nigel Reo Coker. OUT Kekuta Manneh, Gershon Koffie. Score is 1-1' 68' #VWFC #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Steven Whalley
timelineItems.text: And so ends the Manneh experiment. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Attempt blocked. Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Carlos Bocanegra.

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 5' Chivas are all over Vancouver so far. Constant pressure by the midfield has already forced a handful of turnovers #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: 2nd half going from bad to worse for #VWFC, not dictating game as they were in 1st, Harvey sees red (deservedly) #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Peter Galindo
timelineItems.text: Stupid challenge from Jordan Harvey. That's a textbook red card. #WhitecapsFC down to 10 men. 1-1, 70'

timelineItems.name: Mike Martignago
timelineItems.text: Just when #WhitecapsFC Nigel Reo-Coker thinks he can play midfield...

timelineItems.name: News1130 Sports
timelineItems.text: Jordan Harvey is given a straight red card in the 69th minute. Whitecaps are down to 10 men tied 1-1 with Chivas #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Neil Crawford
timelineItems.text: Maybe a bit harsh but he left the ground with both feet out. Red. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: Dumb challenge from Harvey. Red Card… #WhitecapsFC down to 10 men

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Chobaniuk
timelineItems.text: Fair red, complete bonehead play by Jordan Harvey... #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Will GT
timelineItems.text: So Harvey gets a red card for fouling a guy who should have been booked for not retreating on a goal kick.. this ref has lost the plot #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Thomas Tesan
timelineItems.text: Go figure.. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Tom Biro
timelineItems.text: Oh wow, straight red for Jordan Harvey. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Oops. See ya later, Jordan Harvey. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: VCTF
timelineItems.text: Dean on for Fernandez. Playing for the draw now. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Mike Martignago
timelineItems.text: Reckless from #WhitecapsFC Harvey. Really silly.

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: That's a red all day and Jordan Harvey knows it. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: VanCityVilla
timelineItems.text: 100% Red Card. Reckless play and you could see the disappointment in Harvey’s face. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Nigel Reo-Coker smashes a one time effort inches wide

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: Attendance for #VWFC tonight: 19,383. Their first non-sellout of the season. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Erik Hurtado.

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: Clear red card for Jordan Harvey, very similar to the Shane O' Neill play earlier in the night that did not get a red. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Don Merry
timelineItems.text: 10 MAN #WhitecapsFC need to hang on after Harvey sent off for reckless challenge.Bit of a harsh decision but a not entirely unwarranted red.

timelineItems.name: Jon William
timelineItems.text: @WhitecapsFC doing a great #BRA impersonation, horrible defence on #CHV goal & now falling apart @MLS #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Brezlin
timelineItems.text: So close from Reo-C #WhitecapsFC #vancouver

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Steven Beitashour.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: What a miss by Reo C! He goes far-post with that...it's 2-1 'Caps... Find work again by @Etado19 to set up the Englishman. #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) stops Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) before he can get his shot off.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy takes the ball off Darren Mattocks feet

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: LT: Tonight's attendance comes a game after #VWFC opened an additional 1,500 seats for the Cascadia game against the Sounders.

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Nigel Reo-Joker, am I right? #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: @WhitecapsFC not showing any concerns they are down a man. Still realize it';s a home match and 3 pts. are required. #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Okay, I take back what I said about Zardez… that title goes to Darren Mattocks. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Dan Orlowitz
timelineItems.text: Chivas not looking very impressive up a man. Guess we won't see Kaji make his debut tonight at this rate... #VANvCHV

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 2. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Erick Torres powers home the header

timelineItems.name: Marc Trasolini
timelineItems.text: Watching Ex-Bronco @Etado19 doin work for #WhitecapsFC http://t.co/OKIHwkb6LL

timelineItems.name: Marc Trasolini
timelineItems.text: Watching Ex-Bronco @Etado19 doin work for #WhitecapsFC http://t.co/OKIHwkb6LL

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: @KyroK11 #ChivasUSA seem to often play not to lose, which is frustrating to watch - much better from #VWFC after going down to 10 men #MLS

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: Chivas lead 2-1 over #WhitecapsFC… well set up from Chivas USA

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA take the lead in the 81st minute. Cross into the box. Erick Torres with the goal. Has goals in five straight games now. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Vancity_FC
timelineItems.text: More points needlessly thrown away at home @WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: GOAL - #ChivasUSA's Erick Torres does the robot and more importantly scores his 13th goal to give his team a 2-1 lead over #WhitecapsFC. 82'

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: CUBO CUBO CUBO!!! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Jeff Paterson
timelineItems.text: Uh oh. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Andrew Chobaniuk
timelineItems.text: Damn... #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #VWFC with so many chances after going down to 10 men - conservative #ChivasUSA string a brilliant play together to go up 2-1 #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.name: Tom Biro
timelineItems.text: Cubo has five goals in five games. Chivas takes the lead. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Cubo! @erickestefano15 does it again and #ChivasUSA has a 2-1 lead over Vancouver. 81st minute

timelineItems.name: VCTF
timelineItems.text: Terrible defensive coverage. #VWFC up against it now. 1-2

timelineItems.name: Raf Noboa y Rivera
timelineItems.text: CUBO TORRES IS THE TRUTH. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 83: Change by #CDCU. A tactical change to their attack as Barrera comes on for Torres. #vancouver 1 - 2 #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Mike Martignago
timelineItems.text: Beauty cross. Beitashour just doesn't mark Torres. Those misses from #WhitecapsFC Mattocks & NRC are bigger now.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Cubo! Who else? @CDChivasUSA lead 2-1 over @WhitecapsFC. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Max Fischer
timelineItems.text: Go ahead, leave Cubo Torres unmarked at the back post. Entirely naïve from #VWFC .

timelineItems.name: ChivaUSA Fighter
timelineItems.text: And we all do the robot celebration!!! CUBOOOOO GOOOOOOOL!!! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Michael Peters
timelineItems.text: This loss goes on the shoulders of NRC. You just can't miss a sitter like he did. #VWFC.

timelineItems.name: Santaniego FC
timelineItems.text: What a great play by Marco Delgado to create space and assist Cubo. Excellent. Great stuff. #ChivasUSA #CuboTorres.

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: Wow. Hard to hate a goal like that. Great work by Torres. #VWFC #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Peter Howard
timelineItems.text: I don't know which I respect more, Torres' ability to score or the smile on his face when he does. #VANvCHV #PlayWithASmile @MLS

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: The attendance is 19,383 spectators @BCPlace to watch #WhitecapsFC vs #ChivasUSA. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Pavel
timelineItems.text: I was just going to call a Torres game winner too. This guy can't stop scoring. #VANvCHV

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: From the equalizer to the Harvey red to Cubo's goal...quite amazing how the 'Caps let things slip in the 2nd half... #VANvCHV #MLS

timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Marco Delgado dives in recklessly

timelineItems.text: Cubo-bot. #VANvCHV http://t.co/ujMx4m20jV

timelineItems.comment: Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Donny Toia (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Mike Martignago
timelineItems.text: Fastest yellow card ever for #WhitecapsFC..?

timelineItems.name: James Gross
timelineItems.text: Jeez. Hate to day it, but Morales doesn’t have a great record now wearing the armband. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Peter Brownell
timelineItems.text: #VWFC Cubo for president!

timelineItems.name: Mathew Harley
timelineItems.text: Name a #WhitecapsFC striker that can score consistently? Camilo comes to mind ... Oh wait.... Never mind

timelineItems.comment: Dan Kennedy (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Not to look too far ahead. But this could be one of the defining events of the #WhitecapsFC season. #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 3. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) right footed shot from more than 35 yards to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Leandro Barrera rolls one into the empty net from distance

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of stoppage time added to the second half of the match

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Oswaldo Minda.

timelineItems.name: sherepunjabradio
timelineItems.text: #11Barrea scores on an empty net. 3:1 for #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: News1130 Sports
timelineItems.text: With David Ousted up for a corner kick, #ChivasUSA gets the ball and puts it into the empty net. #VWFC trail 3-1 in the dying seconds

timelineItems.name: Sean Cruz
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC though they had scored after Pedro Morales put the ball behind the line with Kennedy behind the ball.1/2

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 1, Chivas USA 3.
